msContents.summary: Tax register, recording day by day the collection of money taxes.

msItemStruct.note: Pub. status: Recto; Verso is blank
+ P.Cair. Inv. 57187; P.Iand. VII, 141; P.Mich. Inv. 2830; 3159; 4910

condition.ab: This light-brown papyrus is regularly cut at all sides. The sheet is well preserved apart from a vertical tear. 3 kolleseis. (TC)

handDesc.p: Written in a quick but clear cursive. The scribe separated a new entry from the preceding one by underlining the name of each tax payer. (TC)

origin.origPlace: Karanis, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt
origin.persName: Ptolemaios, son of Leonides, grandson of Petheus, mother Thermouthis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 217)
Petaus, son of Sisois, grandson of Satabous, mother Thermouthis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 209)
Horos alias Karanos, son of Petheus, grandson of Herakles, mother Tauris (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 250)
Heras, the son, mother Tamystha
Karanos, son of Orsenouphis, grandson of Imothes, mother Tapetsiris (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 180)
Achillas, son of Heron, grandson of Orsenouphis, mother Didyme (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 158)
Mysthes, son of Petheus, grandson of Mysthes, mother Tasoucharion (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 189)
Heras, son of Souchas, grandson of Heras, mother Tapetheus (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 169)
Apynchis, son of Pnepheros, grandson of Pakysis, mother Tasoucharion (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 154)
Phasis, son of Petheus, grandson of Heras, mother Thaisas (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 246)
Pasoknopaios, son of Phasis, grandson of Esouris, mother Tanomgeus (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 199)
Ptolemaios, son of Petheus, grandson of Heras, mother Thaisas (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 219)
Sarapion, son of Perigenes, grandson of Akousilaos, mother Tanaios (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 225)
Pnepheros, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Horos, mother Eserempis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 213)
Phanomgeus, son of Petheus, grandson of Satabous, mother of Tamystha (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 245)
Horos, son of Anchophis, grandson of Herakles, mother Teseuris (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 249)
Petsiris, son of Pasoknopiaos, grandson of Petsiris, mother Heros (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 211)
Mystharion, son of Ischyrion, grandson of Euhemeros, mother Tapethis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 188)
Petaus, son of Onnophris, grandson of Petaus, mother Tkateis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 208)
Sarapion, son of Kames, grandson of Heras, mother Thaesis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 225)
Chairemon, son of Phanomgeus, grandson of Phanomgeus, mother Tbellis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 247)
Achillas, son of Phaesis, grandson of Zenas, mother Tasigonis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 158)
Athenion, son of Pyrrhos, grandson of Athenion, mother Tasoucharion (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 150)
Sambas, son of Sokmenis, grandson of Sambas, mother Tkollainis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 224)
Pnepheros, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Onnophris, mother Tkollainis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 213)
Sabinos, son of Petheus, grandson of Phanomgeus, mother Herakleia (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 222)
Ninis, son of Askla, grandson of Ninis, mother Tabous, (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 191)
Ptolemaios, son of Harmiysis, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Tasoucharion (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 216)
Petesouchos, son of Petheus, grandson of Petaus, mother Thaesis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 210)
Anchophis, son of Anchophis, grandson of Petheus, mother Taorsenouphis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 149)
Kastor alias Sabeinos, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Satabous, mother Melitous (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 182)
Polydeukes, son of Hera, grandson of Petheus, mother Tapasion (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 214)
Heras, son of Kelolis, grandson of Heras, mother Thaesis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 170)

provenance.p: Karanis, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt

taxonomy.desc: APIS keywords are controlled locally at the institution level. They are not necessarily consistent.

keywords.term: see electronic version of P.Mich. IV, 224

div.ab: " Column B;Ptolemaios, son of Leonides, grandson of Petheus, mother Thermouthis, 16 drahmas;;Petaus, son of Sisois, grandson of Satabous, mother Thermouthis, 8 drachmas;;Horos alias Karanos, son of Petheus, grandson of Herakles, mother Tauris, 4 bonze drachmas;;Heras, the son, mother Tamystha, 4 bronze drachmas;;Karanos, son of Orsenouphis, grandson of Imothes, mother Tapetsiris, 16 drachmas;;The same12th, the remainder is the administrator fee;;Achillas, son of Heron, grandson of Orsenouphis, mother Didyme, 8 drachmas;;Mysthes, son of Petheus, grandson of Mysthes, mother Tasoucharion, 4 drachmas;;Heras, son of Souchas, grandson of Heras, mother Tapetheus, 4 drachmas;;Apynchis, son of Pnepheros, grandson of Pakysis, mother Tasoucharion, 8 drachmas;;Phasis, son of Petheus, grandson of Heras, mother Thaisas, 16 obols, guard of the aqueducts;;Pasoknopaios, son of Phasis, grandson of Esouris, mother Tanomgeus, 8 drachmas;;Ptolemaios, son of Petheus, grandson of Heras, mother Thaisas, 8 drachmas;;Sarapion, son of Perigenes, grandson of Akousilaos, mother Tanaios, 4 drachmas, 28 obols;;the same 12th year, the remainder is the administrator fee;;Pnepheros, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Horos, mother Eserempis, 12 drachmas;;Phanomgeus, son of Petheus, grandson of Satabous, mother of Tamystha, 4 drachmas;;Horos, son of Anchophis, grandson of Herakles, mother Teseuris, 4 drachmas;;Petsiris, son of Pasoknopiaos, grandson of Petsiris, mother Heros, 4 drachmas;;Mystharion, son of Ischyrion, grandson of Euhemeros, mother Tapethis, 8 drachmas; ;Petaus, son of Onnophris, grandson of Petaus, mother Tkateis, drachmas 8 drachmas;;Sarapion, son of Kames, grandson of Heras, mother Thaesis, 28 obols;;Chairemon, son of Phanomgeus, grandson of Phanomgeus, mother Tbellis, 8 drachmas;;Total for the day: drachmas 96, 24 obols of which the12th year drachmas drachmas 20, 23 obols; for the priests listed below 12 obols; as payment for the 12th year, 12 obols;;The13th of the same (month);;Achillas, son of Phaesis, grandson of Zenas, mother Tasigonis, 20 drachmas;;Athenion, son of Pyrrhos, grandson of Athenion, mother Tasoucharion, 12 drachmas;;Sambas, son of Sokmenis, grandson of Sambas, mother Tkollainis, 4 drachmas;;Pnepheros, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Onnophris, mother Tkollainis, 8 drachmas;;Sabinos, son of Petheus, grandson of Phanomgeus, mother Herakleia, 4 drachmas;;Ninis, son of Askla, grandson of Ninis, mother Tabous, 8 drachmas; ;Ptolemaios, son of Harmiysis, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Tasoucharion, 4 drachmas;;Petesouchos, son of Petheus, grandson of Petaus, mother Thaesis, 12 drachmas;;Anchophis, son of Anchophis, grandson of Petheus, mother Taorsenouphis, 12 drachmas;;Kastor alias Sabeinos, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Satabous, mother Melitous, 8 drachmas;;Polydeukes, son of Hera, grandson of Petheus, mother Tapasion, 8 drachmas;;Heras, son of Kelolis, grandson of Heras, mother Thaesis, 8 drachmas;"
